introduction:
{$greeting} I'm Patrick Kollitsch, known as [David's Neighbour](https://davids-neighbour.com/), a full-stack web developer and online business consultant for small and medium sized companies, building fast, flexible websites from my home office on the beautiful island of Koh Samui in Thailand — yep, the one with the palm trees, white sand beaches, turquoise waters, and scooters that you know from the [White Lotus'ses third season](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13406094/episodes/?season=3).

[KOLLITSCH.dev*](https://kollitsch.dev/) is where smart code meets island life. I use [GoHugo](https://gohugo.io/), [Astro](https://astro.build/), [WordPress](https://wordpress.org/), you name it, and a healthy dose of sunlight to craft websites that work hard, are usable, accessible, and fast, and look darn good doing it.
tagline: Smart websites with a tropical mindset.
